verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5012>prophesy<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> unto the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%>; <S%H1945>Woe<s%> be to the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that do <S%H7462>feed<s%> themselves! should not the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> the <S%H6629>flocks<s%>?

Ye <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%>, and ye <S%H3847>clothe<s%> you with the <S%H6785>wool<s%>, ye <S%H2076>kill<s%> them that are <S%H1277>fed<s%>: but ye <S%H7462>feed<s%> not the <S%H6629>flock<s%>.

The <S%H2470>diseased<s%> have ye not <S%H2388>strengthened<s%>, neither have ye <S%H7495>healed<s%> that which was <S%H2470>sick<s%>, neither have ye bound <S%H2280>up<s%> that which was <S%H7665>broken<s%>, neither have ye brought <S%H7725>again<s%> that which was driven <S%H5080>away<s%>, neither have ye <S%H1245>sought<s%> that which was <S%H6>lost<s%>; but with <S%H2394>force<s%> and with <S%H6531>cruelty<s%> have ye <S%H7287>ruled<s%> them.

And they were <S%H6327>scattered<s%>, because there is no <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>: and they became <S%H402>meat<s%> to all the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, when they were <S%H6327>scattered<s%>.

My <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H7686>wandered<s%> through all the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and upon every <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H1389>hill<s%>: yea, my <S%H6629>flock<s%> was <S%H6327>scattered<s%> upon all the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and none did <S%H1875>search<s%> or <S%H1245>seek<s%> after them.
¶ Therefore, ye <S%H7462>shepherds<s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>;

As I <S%H2416>live<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, surely because my <S%H6629>flock<s%> became a <S%H957>prey<s%>, and my <S%H6629>flock<s%> became <S%H402>meat<s%> to every <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, because there was no <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>, neither did my <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H1875>search<s%> for my <S%H6629>flock<s%>, but the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H7462>fed<s%> themselves, and <S%H7462>fed<s%> not my <S%H6629>flock<s%>;
Therefore, O ye <S%H7462>shepherds<s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>;

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Behold, I am against the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%>; and I will <S%H1875>require<s%> my <S%H6629>flock<s%> at their <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and cause them to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from <S%H7462>feeding<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%>; neither shall the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> themselves any more; for I will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> my <S%H6629>flock<s%> from their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, that they may not be <S%H402>meat<s%> for them.
¶ For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Behold, I, even I, will both <S%H1875>search<s%> my <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, and seek them <S%H1239>out<s%>.

As a <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> seeketh <S%H1243>out<s%> his <S%H5739>flock<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he is <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H6629>sheep<s%> that are <S%H6567>scattered<s%>; so will I seek <S%H1239>out<s%> my <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, and will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them out of all <S%H4725>places<s%> where they have been <S%H6327>scattered<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloudy<s%> and <S%H6205>dark<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And I will bring them <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H6908>gather<s%> them from the <S%H776>countries<s%>, and will <S%H935>bring<s%> them to their own <S%H127>land<s%>, and <S%H7462>feed<s%> them upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by the <S%H650>rivers<s%>, and in all the inhabited <S%H4186>places<s%> of the <S%H776>country<s%>.

I will <S%H7462>feed<s%> them in a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H4829>pasture<s%>, and upon the <S%H4791>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall their <S%H5116>fold<s%> be: there shall they <S%H7257>lie<s%> in a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5116>fold<s%>, and in a <S%H8082>fat<s%> <S%H4829>pasture<s%> shall they <S%H7462>feed<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
I will <S%H7462>feed<s%> my <S%H6629>flock<s%>, and I will cause them to lie <S%H7257>down<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.

I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> that which was <S%H6>lost<s%>, and bring <S%H7725>again<s%> that which was driven <S%H5080>away<s%>, and will bind <S%H2280>up<s%> that which was <S%H7665>broken<s%>, and will <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> that which was <S%H2470>sick<s%>: but I will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> the <S%H8082>fat<s%> and the <S%H2389>strong<s%>; I will <S%H7462>feed<s%> them with <S%H4941>judgment<s%>.

And as for <S%H859>you<s%>, O my <S%H6629>flock<s%>, thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Behold, I <S%H8199>judge<s%> between <S%H7716>cattle<s%> and <S%H7716>cattle<s%>, between the <S%H352>rams<s%> and the he <S%H6260>goats<s%>.

Seemeth it a small <S%H4592>thing<s%> unto you to have eaten <S%H7462>up<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H4829>pasture<s%>, but ye must tread <S%H7429>down<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet<s%> the <S%H3499>residue<s%> of your <S%H4829>pastures<s%>? and to have <S%H8354>drunk<s%> of the <S%H4950>deep<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>, but ye must <S%H7515>foul<s%> the <S%H3498>residue<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet<s%>?

And as for my <S%H6629>flock<s%>, they <S%H7462>eat<s%> that which ye have <S%H4823>trodden<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet<s%>; and they <S%H8354>drink<s%> that which ye have <S%H4833>fouled<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet<s%>.

¶ Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> unto them; Behold, I, even I, will <S%H8199>judge<s%> between the <S%H1274>fat<s%> <S%H7716>cattle<s%> and between the <S%H7330>lean<s%> <S%H7716>cattle<s%>.

Because ye have <S%H1920>thrust<s%> with <S%H6654>side<s%> and with <S%H3802>shoulder<s%>, and <S%H5055>pushed<s%> all the <S%H2470>diseased<s%> with your <S%H7161>horns<s%>, till ye have <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them <S%H2351>abroad<s%>;
Therefore will I <S%H3467>save<s%> my <S%H6629>flock<s%>, and they shall no more be a <S%H957>prey<s%>; and I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> between <S%H7716>cattle<s%> and <S%H7716>cattle<s%>.

And I will set <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> over them, and he shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> them, even my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>; he shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> them, and he shall be their <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>.

And I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will be their <S%H430>God<s%>, and my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> a <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them; I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.

And I will <S%H3772>make<s%> with them a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%>, and will cause the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2416>beasts<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%>: and they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and <S%H3462>sleep<s%> in the <S%H3293%H3264>woods<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> them and the places round <S%H5439>about<s%> my <S%H1389>hill<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing<s%>; and I will cause the <S%H1653>shower<s%> to come <S%H3381>down<s%> in his <S%H6256>season<s%>; there shall be <S%H1653>showers<s%> of <S%H1293>blessing<s%>.

And the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> her <S%H6529>fruit<s%>, and the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> her <S%H2981>increase<s%>, and they shall be <S%H983>safe<s%> in their <S%H127>land<s%>, and shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, when I have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H4133>bands<s%> of their <S%H5923>yoke<s%>, and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those that <S%H5647>served<s%> themselves of them.

And they shall no more be a <S%H957>prey<s%> to the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, neither shall the <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H398>devour<s%> them; but they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%>, and none shall make them <S%H2729>afraid<s%>.

And I will raise <S%H6965>up<s%> for them a <S%H4302>plant<s%> of <S%H8034>renown<s%>, and they shall be no more <S%H622>consumed<s%> with <S%H7458>hunger<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, neither <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H3639>shame<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> any more.

Thus shall they <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> am with them, and that they, even the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, are my <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.

And <S%H859>ye<s%> my <S%H6629>flock<s%>, the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of my <S%H4830>pasture<s%>, are <S%H120>men<s%>, and I am your <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.
